name: Elective Technology
description:
RECii has been developed to enable Recruitment firms and HR teams to leverage the emerging technologies of AI, Voice recognition, BlockChain and intelligent workflow, to significantly increase the profitability, capability, and productivity within recruitment firms, in-house recruitment and HR teams.

The service will fully automate the recruitment process, from inception and integration into a Recruitment firm's CRM through to automation of candidate assessment and recommendation for placement. Significant efficiencies have been identified and qualified with industry partners.

team.name: Gareth Christian-Lim
team.bioHtml: CEO Elective Technology. Ex developer who started first business 2004. Successfully launched 7 businesses. Experienced technologist, board member and NED.

jobs.title: Front End Developer
jobs.description:
Recii is an innovative voice and verification technology platform designed to support the recruitment/HR industry. Leveraging sophisticated automation and AI driven techniques we are looking for a talented, ambitious, front end developer to join our team.

As we continue to expand our offering, evolve our product and lead the technology race, you will help keep us at the forefront of the industry.

Using your core essential technical skills of HTML, CSS and React within this emerging technology environment, you will own and create a dashboard, website and front end features. Engaging at Director level, you will coordinate and deliver stand-ups and sprint planning with other members of the development team

You should possess a solutions orientated mindset and a proactive team spirited approach to helping colleagues resolve challenges.

Responsibilities

The Developer will work as part of an agile team, using a variety of web-focused technology to deliver a cutting-edge experience. Designing and planning technical solutions to meet business requirements. Coding and developing features for new and existing products. Upkeep and maintenance of existing features. Identifying areas for technical improvements / innovations.

Knowledge, Skills, and Experience

HTML
CSS
React
Respoinsive design and UI optimisation
CSS pre-processing framework Sass
Javascript front-end framework ReactJS
Version control systems (e.g. Git)

Perks

Pension
Training budget
Flexible working hours
Fresh fruit daily
Unlimited tea / coffee
In house cinema
Gym
Members bar
Weekly team lunches
